fields.label: Taxpayer Number
fields.name: taxpayerId
fields.validation: 9 or 11 digits; cannot start with 2 if 11 digits

fields.label: Texas Secretary of State File Number
fields.name: fileNumber

notes: Search form submit is handled via JavaScript; on submit it calls GET to data-search/franchise-tax with a single query param (name, taxpayerId, or fileNumber).
The response is JSON: {success: true, data: [...]}. DataTable loads name/taxpayerId/zip.
Detail endpoint data-search/franchise-tax/{taxpayerId} returns full address, SOS file number, and other fields.
Public API v1 endpoints require x-api-key; the site uses unauthenticated comptroller.texas.gov/data-search endpoints.
Zip code is displayed in results but not a supported query param; filtering must be done client-side after fetching by name/taxpayerId/fileNumber.
